message.text: `String String.Concat(String,String,String)()` is tainted by passed as argument #1 to String PulseTaintTests.UserControlledInputSourceNotAsync(String) with kind UserControlledURI and flows to passed as argument #1 to Void DbCommand.set_CommandText(String) with kind SQLInjection (tainted flow).
source of the taint here: passed as argument #1 to String PulseTaintTests.UserControlledInputSourceNotAsync(String) with kind UserControlledURI
in call to function `String String.Concat(String,String,String)` with no summary
passed as argument #1 to Void DbCommand.set_CommandText(String) with kind SQLInjection

Unprotected write. Non-private method `ThreadSafety.withdraw(...)` writes to field `this.ThreadSafety.mBalance` outside of synchronization.
 Reporting because another access to the same memory occurs on a background thread, although this access may not.

Read/Write race. Non-private method `ThreadSafety.withdraw(...)` reads without synchronization from `this.ThreadSafety.mBalance`. Potentially races with write in method `ThreadSafety.deposit(...)`.
 Reporting because another access to the same memory occurs on a background thread, although this access may not.
`String ThreadSafety.NullDeReferenceBad()()` could be null (from the call to `ThreadSafety.NullDeReferenceBad()` on line 342) and is dereferenced.
is assigned to the null pointer
